Git, Github, Netlify 안도현 2021-11-20 Chapter 1 Prerequisites 로컬컴퓨터에서 깃을 설치한다음, RStudio로 깃헙으로 동기화. 깃헙의 내용을 자동으로 네틀리파이로 배포. install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/.
